summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2427, for the improvement of the alley in block 10, Bell & Denny's addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley running from Clay Street to Cedar Street, between 1st Avenue and Western Avenue, by grading and planking the same, under Ordinance No. 25450 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
